Class OrderMenu.PizzaItem

java.lang.Object
OrderMenu.OrderItem
OrderMenu.PizzaItem
Enclosing class:
OrderMenu
protected static class OrderMenu.PizzaItem
extends OrderMenu.OrderItem
A class representing a pizza with a size, crust, number of toppings, and cost.

  • Constructor Details

    • PizzaItem

      PizzaItem​(java.lang.String size, java.lang.String crust, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toppings)
      Creates an instance of the PizzaItem class. The cost of the item is calculated based on the size of the pizza.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the pizza. The valid sizes are (case insensitive): "SMALL", "MEDIUM", "LARGE", "EXTRA-LARGE". Any size that does match one of those will default to "EXTRA LARGE" and print a warning message to the console.
      crust - The type of the crust
      toppings - The toppings on the pizza

  • Method Details

    • getCrust

      java.lang.String getCrust()
      Returns:
      The type of crust of the pizza

    • getToppings

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getToppings()
      Returns:
      The toppings on the pizza in an array

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Returns a String in the following format:

      Pizza: size, crust, toppings, $cost
